thread.section_title: Redspot Car Rentals Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Redspot Car Rentals | redspot.com.au | 4 of 693
thread.title: JESSIKA
thread.title_full: Redspot Car Rentals reviewed by JESSIKA

author: JESSIKA
title: JESSIKA
text: I picked up my rental car and to my dismay the tank was obviously not full. I took a photo of this as I did not have time to address the issue straight away. When I dropped the car off the man told me they would happily refund me but never did. I am disappointed by this, as redspot charge you severely for not having a full tank of fuel when you drop off the car and yet no consideration was displayed when this issue occured from their side
